trans-unit.source: Build integrated solutions with SQL Data Warehouse | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Build integrated solutions with SQL Data Warehouse | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Tools and partners with solutions that integrate with SQL Data Warehouse.
trans-unit.target: Tools and partners with solutions that integrate with SQL Data Warehouse.

trans-unit.source: Integrate Services with SQL Data Warehouse
trans-unit.target: Integrate Services with SQL Data Warehouse

trans-unit.source: In addition to its core functionality, SQL Data Warehouse enables users to leverage many of the other services in Azure alongside it.
trans-unit.target: In addition to its core functionality, SQL Data Warehouse enables users to leverage many of the other services in Azure alongside it.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, we have currently taken steps to deeply integrate with the following:
trans-unit.target: Specifically, we have currently taken steps to deeply integrate with the following:

trans-unit.source: Power BI
trans-unit.target: Power BI

trans-unit.source: Azure Data Factory
trans-unit.target: Azure Data Factory

trans-unit.source: Azure Machine Learning
trans-unit.target: Azure Machine Learning

trans-unit.source: Azure Stream Analytics
trans-unit.target: Azure Stream Analytics

trans-unit.source: In addition to these, we are in the process of working to more deeply partner with a number of other services across the Azure ecosystem.
trans-unit.target: In addition to these, we are in the process of working to more deeply partner with a number of other services across the Azure ecosystem.

trans-unit.source: Power BI
trans-unit.target: Power BI

trans-unit.source: Power BI integration allows users to heavily leverage the compute power of SQL Data Warehouse with the dynamic reporting and visualization of Power BI.
trans-unit.target: Power BI integration allows users to heavily leverage the compute power of SQL Data Warehouse with the dynamic reporting and visualization of Power BI.

trans-unit.source: The integration with Power BI corrently includes:
trans-unit.target: The integration with Power BI corrently includes:

trans-unit.source: **Direct Connect**: A more advanced connection with logical pushdown against SQL Data Warehouse.
trans-unit.target: **Direct Connect**: A more advanced connection with logical pushdown against SQL Data Warehouse.

trans-unit.source: This allow for quicker analysis at a larger scale.
trans-unit.target: This allow for quicker analysis at a larger scale.

trans-unit.source: **Open in Power BI**: The 'Open in Power BI' button passes instance information to Power BI, allowing for a more seamless connection.
trans-unit.target: **Open in Power BI**: The 'Open in Power BI' button passes instance information to Power BI, allowing for a more seamless connection.

trans-unit.source: See [Integrate with Power BI](../sql-data-warehouse-integrate-power-bi.md) or the [Power BI documentation](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/powerbi/archive/2015/06/24/exploring-azure-sql-data-warehouse-with-power-bi.aspx) for more information.
trans-unit.target: See [Integrate with Power BI](../sql-data-warehouse-integrate-power-bi.md) or the [Power BI documentation](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/powerbi/archive/2015/06/24/exploring-azure-sql-data-warehouse-with-power-bi.aspx) for more information.

trans-unit.source: Azure Data Factory
trans-unit.target: Azure Data Factory

trans-unit.source: Azure Data Factory gives users a managed platform to create complex Extract-Transform-Load pipelines.
trans-unit.target: Azure Data Factory gives users a managed platform to create complex Extract-Transform-Load pipelines.

trans-unit.source: SQL Data Warehouse's integration with Azure Data Factory includes the following:
trans-unit.target: SQL Data Warehouse's integration with Azure Data Factory includes the following:

trans-unit.source: **Data Movement**: Schedule data transfer across a number of on-premise and azure services.
trans-unit.target: **Data Movement**: Schedule data transfer across a number of on-premise and azure services.

trans-unit.source: **Stored Procedures**: Orchestrate the execution of stored procedures on SQL Data Warehouse.
trans-unit.target: **Stored Procedures**: Orchestrate the execution of stored procedures on SQL Data Warehouse.

trans-unit.source: See [Integrate with Azure Data Factory](../sql-data-warehouse-integrate-azure-data-factory.md) or the [Azure Data Factory documentation](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/services/data-factory/) for more information.
trans-unit.target: See [Integrate with Azure Data Factory](../sql-data-warehouse-integrate-azure-data-factory.md) or the [Azure Data Factory documentation](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/services/data-factory/) for more information.

trans-unit.source: Azure Machine Learning
trans-unit.target: Azure Machine Learning

trans-unit.source: Azure Machine Learning is a fully managed analytics service which allows users to create intricate models leveraging a large set of predictive tools.
trans-unit.target: Azure Machine Learning is a fully managed analytics service which allows users to create intricate models leveraging a large set of predictive tools.

trans-unit.source: SQL Data Warehouse is supported as both a source and destination for these models with the following functionality:
trans-unit.target: SQL Data Warehouse is supported as both a source and destination for these models with the following functionality:

trans-unit.source: **Read Data:** Drive models at scale using T-SQL against SQL Data Warehouse.
trans-unit.target: **Read Data:** Drive models at scale using T-SQL against SQL Data Warehouse.

trans-unit.source: **Write Data:** Commit changes from any model back to SQL Data Warehouse.
trans-unit.target: **Write Data:** Commit changes from any model back to SQL Data Warehouse.

trans-unit.source: See [Integrate with Azure Machine Learning](../sql-data-warehouse-integrate-azure-machine-learning.md) or the [Azure Machine Learning documentation](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/machine-learning/) for more information.
trans-unit.target: See [Integrate with Azure Machine Learning](../sql-data-warehouse-integrate-azure-machine-learning.md) or the [Azure Machine Learning documentation](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/machine-learning/) for more information.

trans-unit.source: Azure Stream Analytics
trans-unit.target: Azure Stream Analytics

trans-unit.source: Azure Stream Analytics is a complex, fully managed infrastructure for processing and consuming event data generated from Azure Event Hub.
trans-unit.target: Azure Stream Analytics is a complex, fully managed infrastructure for processing and consuming event data generated from Azure Event Hub.

trans-unit.source: Integration with SQL Data Warehouse allows for streaming data to be effectively processed and stored alongside relational data enabling deeper, more advanced analysis.
trans-unit.target: Integration with SQL Data Warehouse allows for streaming data to be effectively processed and stored alongside relational data enabling deeper, more advanced analysis.

trans-unit.source: **Job Output:** Send output from Stream Analytics jobs directly to SQL Data Warehouse.
trans-unit.target: **Job Output:** Send output from Stream Analytics jobs directly to SQL Data Warehouse.

trans-unit.source: See [Integrate with Azure Stream Analytics](../sql-data-warehouse-integrate-azure-stream-analytics.md) or the [Azure Stream Analytics documentation](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/services/stream-analytics/) for more information.
trans-unit.target: See [Integrate with Azure Stream Analytics](../sql-data-warehouse-integrate-azure-stream-analytics.md) or the [Azure Stream Analytics documentation](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/services/stream-analytics/) for more information.
